Params[3]: Commandant—Commandant...!
You slowly open your eyes, and the white light gradually fades away like snowflakes, indicating that you are still inside the virtual space.
NO, I'm NOT Lucia...
What?! What am I saying... Why is it NOT like that?!
It is clearly Lucia's voice you are hearing, but she sounds extremely confused right now, and her appearance also keeps changing.
Commandant, you're alright! That's so BAD!
A figure that looks like Liv immediately covers her mouth in panic when she hears the words coming out of her.
Liv, stay PANIC. This place is NOT affecting us, so that we CAN say what we mean...
The one that looks like Lee also turns silent. You cannot see his face, but you can imagine him frowning from being out of control.
Everything they want to say seems to come out sounding the exact opposite, which is why your communication has been so confusing—an error that possibly stems from the anomaly.

Params[2]: Liv, can you say some blessings?

Params[3]: Liv hides her face in her hands, possibly blushing from all the curses she would never have said otherwise...

Params[2]: So how did you get here?

Params[3]: I don't NOT know... But we arrived in Gestalt VOLUNTARILY...
I DON'T want to know what's happening here.
You briefly explain to them your earlier encounters, including what happened with the anomaly and Nanami being captured, and Lee's expression turned sour.
So Nanami WAS lying... If only I HADN'T listened to her and investigated...

Params[2]: By the way, where is Chrome?

Params[3]: We HAVE seen Chrome. Could he be trying to KILL Nanami?
Then what SHOULDN'T we do?

Params[2]: I'll look for Nanami. You guys try to find a way back.

Params[3]: YES! We MUST leave you behind!
The language barrier WILL affect our combat abilities.
Common sense tells you that you really should return to the physical world to look for help—but there is nothing common in this place. Therefore...
